summary: A bar girl hires a struggling actor to give her acting lessons so that she can feign a greater interest in her customers. The longer they work together, the more they find they have in common.
cast: Stephen Chow|Karen Mok|Cecilia Cheung|Man-Tat Ng|Kai-Man Tin|Chi-Sing Lam|Po Chun Chan|Joe Cheng|Man-Fai Cheng|Mo-Chan Chik|Kwok-Ping Choi|Lung Dai|Min-Hun Fung|Woon-Ling Hau|Clarence Hui|Foo-Keung Kong|Roderick Lam|Siu-Kei Lee|Sze-Chit Lee|Kim-Ching Luk|Sherwin Ming|Robert Sparks|Siu-Ling Tsim|Terence Tsui|Bobby Yip|Ben Yuen|Jackie Chan
title: Hei kek ji wong
